title: Who is Maddison Brown, Liam Hemsworth's new love interest?
text:
The Australian actors were seen together in New York (Picture: Getty)

Months after splitting from Miley Cyrus, Liam Hemsworth was spotted holding hands with a new woman, actress Maddison Brown.

While Miley has been publicly linked with Kaitlynn Carter and Cody Simpson since her split, 29-year-old Liam has been keeping things pretty low key, heading back to his native Australia to send some time in Byron Bay.

On returning to the US, Liam was seen out and about with 22-year-old fellow Aussie Maddison in New York, with the pair heading to Italian restaurant Sant Ambroeus where they enjoyed drinks outside.

Here’s everything we know about Liam’s new love interest:

You probably recognise her from Dynasty

Maddison is best known for her work on Dynasty: no, not the 80s shoulder pad spectacular, the 2017 reboot.

The actress joined the show for its second season in 2018, playing Ugly Betty star Alan Dale’s daughter Kirby.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Maddison is BFFs with her Dynasty co-star Elizabeth Gillies, who you may recognise from Ariana Grande’s thank u, next video, with the pair often appearing on each other’s Instagrams.

Before Dynasty, the Australian native starred opposite Nicole Kidman and Joseph Fiennes in thriller Strangerland, as well as The Kettering Incident, a series dubbed ‘Tasmania’s answer to Twin Peaks’ by The Guardian.

Listing Natalie Portman, Reese Witherspoon and Margot Robbie among her inspirations, we think she’s in good company.

Like Liam, she’s acted from a young age

Just like her new beau first appeared in Home and Away in 2007, Maddison has been acting since she was a child, with her first acting credit coming from 2004 TV movie Go Big.

‘I was always drawn to acting — as a child, I took community acting classes and really took to it and loved it,’ she told i-D.

‘Since I was about five, my whole life has been my career — yes, I was travelling the world but I missed out on lots of rites of passage such as going to a formal and having a boyfriend when I was young.’

She’s also a model

The multi-hyphenate, uber beautiful star is also a model, because of course she is.

Starting modelling at the age of 13, she’s walked for the likes of Calvin Klein, House of Holland and MiuMiu and has been featured in Vogue Australia, but counts acting as her main passion.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Acting as a child helped me deal with rejection from a very young age. […] It made the first few years as a model easier,’ she told Wonderland Magazine.

She’s got good Instagram game

Not that we’d expect anything less from a 22-year-old actress and model, but Maddison is very good at Instagram.

Documenting her life for her 450,000 followers, her feed is a tasteful mix of fashion shoots, selfies and partying with her friends, while letting her personality shine through with some political slogans and banter with her friends.

Oh, and dogs. Lots of cute dogs.

She looks a lot like Bella Thorne

If the comment sections below Maddison’s pictures tell us anything, it’s that everyone thinks she looks like Bella Thorne.

TBH, we can see it; the red hair, pale skin, model good looks.

Who knows, maybe dating Liam could lead the pair to meet? Now that’s a crossover episode we’d like to see!
description: Months after splitting from Miley Cyrus, Liam Hemsworth was spotted holding hands with a new woman, actress Maddison Brown.
